name: Rocket Snail
description:
Rocket Snail is a game about a snail named Rocket. Rocket has a special gift: he can see unseen love where others can't. Unfortunately, it exists in the air (typically at night, but during the day too) so he had to come up with a way to get to it - so he invented jet boosters to help him fly.

Fly using Rocket's unconventional jet boosters and help him collect the hearts in order to spread the love all over the world.

W or Up to Boost
A or Left to tilt Left, D or Right to tilt Right
